snippet.title: DoubleShake, A Throwback to 5th Gen Platformers
snippet.description:
NOW LIVE on Kickstarter! Help Support DoubleShake's development!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/rightstick/doubleshake-a-throwback-to-5th-gen-platformers

Doubleshake is a game inspired by classic 5th Generation games such as Mischief Makers, Tomba!, and Klonoa!  Grab, shake, throw, and kick to save your islands from total chaos in this action-packed blast-to-the-past 2.5D platformer!
